headline: A Look At Extra Space Storage (EXR) Valuation After Its Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Why Extra Space Storage is on investors’ radar today Extra Space Storage (EXR) has been drawing fresh attention after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at US$147.13. That puts its recent month gain at 12.6% against a slightly negative past 3 months return. See our latest analysis for Extra Space Storage. The recent 12.6% 1 month share price return and 7.9% 7 day share price move come after a softer 2.9% 3 month share price decline. The 1 year total shareholder return sits at...
